text: We will build 3 crore additional houses for the poor and middle class under PM Awas Yojana in the next 5 years.
summary: Build 3 crore additional houses under PMAY in 5 years
statusReason: PM Awas Yojana Urban 2.0 launched in August 2024 with target of 1 crore urban houses. Budget allocation of Rs 10 lakh crore announced. Implementation ongoing.

text: We will continue to provide free ration to 80 crore beneficiaries under PM Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana for the next 5 years.
summary: Continue free ration for 80 crore people for 5 years
statusReason: PM Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana extended for 5 years (till December 2028) in Union Budget 2024-25. 80+ crore beneficiaries continue to receive free foodgrains.

text: We are committed to implementing One Nation One Election for Lok Sabha and State Assemblies.
statusReason: High-Level Committee under former President Ram Nath Kovind submitted report in March 2024 recommending simultaneous elections. Constitution Amendment Bills introduced in December 2024, referred to JPC.

text: We will implement the Uniform Civil Code across India.
statusReason: Uttarakhand became first state to implement UCC (February 2024). Law Commission examining feedback. No national UCC bill introduced in Parliament yet as of early 2026.

text: We will ensure 100% saturation of piped water supply to all rural households under Jal Jeevan Mission by 2024.
summary: 100% piped water to rural households via Jal Jeevan Mission
statusReason: As of January 2026, approximately 78% of rural households have tap water connections under JJM. Target of 100% saturation revised. 15 states/UTs achieved 100% coverage.

text: We will make India a global hub for semiconductor manufacturing and attract major investments in chip fabrication.
summary: Make India a global semiconductor manufacturing hub
statusReason: India Semiconductor Mission active. Micron's $2.75 billion facility in Gujarat under construction. Tata-PSMC fab in Gujarat approved. First made-in-India chips expected by 2026.

text: We will expand Ayushman Bharat to provide free health insurance to all senior citizens above 70 years, regardless of income.
summary: Expand Ayushman Bharat to all citizens above 70 years
statusReason: Announced in Union Budget 2024-25. Ayushman Bharat extended to all citizens 70+ regardless of income. Implementation began October 2024.

text: We will increase capital expenditure to Rs 15 lakh crore annually and fast-track infrastructure development.
summary: Increase capital expenditure to Rs 15 lakh crore annually
statusReason: Union Budget 2024-25 allocated Rs 11.11 lakh crore for capital expenditure, an 11% increase from previous year. On track to reach Rs 15 lakh crore target by 2028-29.

text: We will ensure that the process for implementation of Women Reservation Act is completed at the earliest.
summary: Implement Women's Reservation Act at earliest
statusReason: Nari Shakti Vandan Act passed in 2023. Implementation linked to delimitation exercise after next Census. Census 2021 delayed due to COVID, now expected 2025. Delimitation to follow.

text: We will establish 'Viksit Bharat' by 2047, making India a developed nation on the centenary of independence.
summary: Make India a developed nation by 2047 (Viksit Bharat)
statusReason: Viksit Bharat @2047 vision document being prepared. Various sectoral targets set. Long-term goal - assessment possible only over time. Interim milestones being tracked.

text: We will provide internship opportunities to 1 crore youth in top companies over 5 years with Rs 5,000 monthly allowance.
summary: 1 crore internships for youth with Rs 5,000/month allowance
statusReason: PM Internship Scheme announced in Budget 2024-25. Portal launched October 2024. First batch of internships started. Target: 1 crore internships over 5 years in 500 top companies.

text: We will ensure India becomes the 3rd largest economy in the world during our third term.
statusReason: India currently 5th largest economy. Projected to overtake Japan and Germany by 2027-28 based on IMF projections. On track but dependent on sustained growth rates.
